ProductFaultCode.name: ProductFaultCode
ProductFaultCode.description: Represents a relationship between a product or product family and the fault code.

FaultCodeId.description: The fault code associated with the product or product family.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The auto-generated number for the name of the product fault code.

ProductFamily.description: The product family associated with the fault code.

ProductId.description: The ID of the product associated with the fault code.
